website_summaries.verdict: Tie-down straps on this good-size outdoor screen help it stand up well in the wind.
pros: Can be used with either front or rear projection
Screen can be removed and washed
Can fit in a large duffel bag
cons: complaints that screen material is too thin

customer_reviews.title: Pleased overall
customer_reviews.text: We've tried various approaches through the years for backdoor movies. Projecting on a PVC type thing we bought commercially that took too long to set up. Projecting on the house, etc. We all remarked that this was the best set-up yet for us. We have found this to be very good overall. One thing we don't really like is that we frequently notice the projector light from the rear projection. I guess that's unavoidable, maybe. We like this product overall and would buy it again. We are concerned about tears forming in the fabric...they provide back-up patches which tells me this must happen enough for them to provide it. We shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen R.

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for Family Movie nights at our school and it was the best purchase we made this year. It’s incredibly easy to set up and take down. We bought a large plastic tote to store it in. The quality is great and I want to purchase one for home. The motor is also pretty quiet. I was coming concerned it would be overly loud but it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa T

customer_reviews.title: Awesome screen - definitely a wow! factor
customer_reviews.text: This screen is really an awesome find. We were pleasantly surprised at how easy it was to set up and take down. Everything worked perfectly out of the box, and we had it set up in just a few minutes. The size of the screen is really impressive, too ~ our neighbors' kids were trying to peer pressure their parents to purchase their own. We have a small home theater in our bonus room, so we wanted something really big to justify not watching indoors in comfy chairs. This screen made the fact that we're watching football at home instead of in a stadium a little better, and it was the centerpiece of a great night with friends.
customer_reviews.author: BethNC

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price. Takes 2 to setup right.
customer_reviews.text: Solid build. Blows up fine. It takes two to velcro the screen in place if you dont want to get it dirty. The 16’ is huge and is too big for insdie your house. Also be aware thay the back takes up room too. Ive read other reviews of people saying thte cant rear project. I was able to do both. The blower (though isnt loud) is too loud for most projectors 2-8 watt speaker. This can be fixed by adding speakers. Ive used mine kn the wind without the tiedowns it comes with and t holds up. The screen will move a bit, but not enough to take away from the movie or the thing youre watching.
customer_reviews.author: The Beer Shop

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe how much I love this projector screen!! The material is super durable, it literally blows itself right up, and is really sturdy. It’s so easy to put the screen on because of the Velcro (great idea!) and it blows up and deflates in a matter of seconds. I like how they moved the logo to the side so it’s not an eyesore. It also came with stakes and rope in case it’s a super windy day. If there’s no wind you don’t need to stake it down. This was money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product & Company!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful experience with both the company and the product. The first screen that was shipped had a slight tear in the stitching of the bottom right column. When I contacted them about the issue, they responded almost instantly, were genuinely apologetic, and provided above and beyond customer service. The replacement works like a champ and our kids love it! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Scott

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!  Easy set-up and quick inflate time
customer_reviews.text: Can't complain - read the set up instructions and zip the release vent and in 2 minutes it is up. Velcro the screen in place and you are good to go. The best feature of this screen is that you can project from behind the screen or in front. This gives much better flexibility then the competition. The only nit is that the manufacturer does not give the screen size - just the 16' diagonal of the entire unit. Still it takes a 16:9 screen image. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is Well worth the money!!! No issues at all.
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this screen. We purchased this last minute. It came 2 days later. Which it what I wanted. Blew it up. Fast and easy! Velcroed the screen on. Easy!! THE PICTURE ON THIS SCREEN IS AMAZING!!!! No ripples No flaws. You CANNOT HEAR THE MOTOR GOING AT ALL. The other plus. If it rained outside I would have no worries either. Which is nice. Its shocking that something so inexpensive is soo incredible! I'm serious the picture was amazing on this!
customer_reviews.author: jackelyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Fulcrum
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It is easy to install after you do it the second time. The white lettering will let you know which direction is the front. It takes less then a minute to blow up air. I've used it at last four times so far. Trying to get as much use as I can before summer heat comes around.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Sulkes

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, just needed a little advice on how to set up.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Item in July and because of our lovely Kansas weather I've had been able to use it. I did have problems with the screen though. After working with the seller my problem was resolved. Had a neighborhood movie night and drew a bigger crowd than expected. I think the kids were as fascinated with the big blow up as the were with the movie. Big hit Jim
customer_reviews.author: James A Cox Jr

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, good price, easy set-up, quick takedown, works great for rear projection. Far exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Andy R.

customer_reviews.title: Have fun on movie night.
customer_reviews.text: This screen is easy to put up. Must have if you want that backyard movie night to be fun and exciting. Bringing that drive-in feel to your backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Donald E. Speis Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Screen is cheap material.  Works though.
customer_reviews.text: Screen is cheap material, but for the price, what do you expect. Be careful with it and the blow up works fine
customer_reviews.author: Professional AV

customer_reviews.title: Not with the hassle
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble with the product when received last year lots of ups and downs in getting everything corrected - thought they did right by me because they sent a new screen after stitching was not correct. Then I had to settle but they did discount it. Needless to say we got it at the end of the summer last year (aug) by the time all was said and done and then pull it out this year and the blower did not work and turn on. Emailed company. No return or communication back this was early in the summer such a headache. The blower is suppose to be warranty for a year. Wish the company would have called me back.
customer_reviews.author: The Rev

customer_reviews.title: Perfect except the unnecessary lettering on the front
customer_reviews.text: It works as you’d expect. Fan is a weee bit noisy but shouldn’t be an issue in normal uses. The name on the front is cheesy as hell but it does what it needs to.
customer_reviews.author: Danial E Bennett

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for backyard movie nights! We set this up for a socially distanced bday party and it was a huge hit! Everyone asked when we were having the next party because they enjoyed it so much. Perfect for medium to large yards too. We had 20ppl spaced out over our 1 acre yard and everyone could see perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: A.T.

customer_reviews.title: This was great..
customer_reviews.text: This was great....O.M.G. I connected my Bose L1 to this ...I nearly blew the neighborhood. Later, I had a Family Movie night in the neighborhood...it was like we were in the theatres outside. Get one today....get it, get it...What are you waiting on!
customer_reviews.author: Daprice

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!!!
customer_reviews.text: We got the 16' screen for our annual party. The cost for renting has doubled since 2014, so I ordered the size we were familiar with. My husband and I set it up to test it with all our gear. It inflates quickly and is well-made, sturdy and the projection is close to perfect with our equipment. I'll find a large wheeled duffle to store it in. We're happy with our purchase and excited to be able to host movie nights on our hill as often as weather permits.
customer_reviews.author: KindleKandleordie

customer_reviews.title: Our family love it
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Cannot attest to durability as yet as we have only used it once. Also wish it came with a storage bag but overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Chen Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great product wows everyone
customer_reviews.text: I love this screen I have hosted parties and people want more. I wish I could get another one asap and wish there was a screen that could show in daylight sold separately. Only thing is the stakes are pretty cheap and bend. So I ordered stakes on Amazon that were sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Inflatable material is extremely durable and strong. The screen fits perfectly and allows for a rear projector to be used with great picture quality. Comes complete with blower, but I would recommend getting stronger stakes to anchor it to the ground. It can be set up as a one person job
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: The Great Big Screen !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Better than I thought it would be. Very sturdy and wrinkle free screen. Easy setup and take down
customer_reviews.author: Markechio Golden

customer_reviews.title: Awesome inflatable screen!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the ease of set up. Inflated quickly. Durable materials. Used for the first time on July 4th, great experience! So happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: product police

customer_reviews.title: perfect size for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: the only thing is the size of the thing requires a large blower and that does create noise, however, it is not enough to interfere with the enjoyment. I must say i'm glad i bought it on Prime day at a significantly reduced price
customer_reviews.author: CB & NB

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed! The inflatable screen is so sturdy with a very quiet blower. I love that the actual white screen is soft like a bed sheet. It has velcro around the entire outside so it stretches onto the screen with no wrinkles. I was hesitant on spending so much money since we saw others way cheaper, but I don't think you could beat the quality of this one. Spend the little extra.. You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Valarie

customer_reviews.title: Well Made! Easy set up!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Had to return the first one I received due to the stitching splitting behind the velcro but no issues besides that. You can project images from the front and the back. The only problem I found is that if you are projecting from the front and have a light source somewhere in the rear(ie. My neighbors back yard light) it shines through. Would be nice if it came with a black screen to add behind the white screen to prevent this but it is what it is. Family and friends loved it. Pretty easy to fold up and put away with some practice.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Used twice before it split at the seam...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this inflatable big screen last August for our annual football viewing party in the Fall. It was a huge hit & worked perfectly...twice. Just took it out of the bag to blow up & use again & it tore at the seem when it was inflated. So disappointed since we’ve only been able to use it two times! Augh...hoping the company can assist!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Cox

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my brother in law who wanted to have summer movies outside for his grandkids, and nephews. Really was impressed by it and set up very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert Leija jr

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor Movie Screen
customer_reviews.text: You will not regret this purchase! Great fun; especially during these trying times!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great purchase! The only hiccup has been anchoring it down. The stakes provided & the loops on screen don't quite work because once inflated the stakes are too short. We ended up using boat anchors and it has been fabulous! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K. DeLozier

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the product with the plan of having outdoor movie night for the kids. The product came very well packaged and set up was incredibly easy. Screen was bigger then we thought it would be, but that is a good thing for us. 100% worth the amount we paid for it and the sturdiness was VERY solid. As the picture shows, it was solid projection surface. Would totally recommend this product to anyone looking for an outdoor screen.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great screen, super easy set up!
customer_reviews.text: The most difficult part of using this screen is just getting it situated right side up the first time. We are using a rolling duffel bag (not included) as storage and can go from duffle to ready in under 5 minutes. The screen is sturdy and the blower super quiet.
customer_reviews.author: CatlinSTJ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Use this for backyard theatre. Really easy to put up and seems to be very durable. Time will tell but so far so good
customer_reviews.author: MikeEB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Worked perfectly. One catch - there is a flap near the intake that has to be closed. Once we figured that out, it was perfect for our awards ceremony!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Nattrass

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We have movie night's at home and when we go Camping. We and everybody else loves it
customer_reviews.author: SSR

customer_reviews.title: This inflatable movie screen was a great choice. It inflates and deflates very fast
customer_reviews.text: This inflatable movie screen was a great choice. It inflates and deflates very fast. The white screen fabric is held on with Velcro and comes off very quickly for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Andee

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for folks who want to have an outdoor movie ...
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for folks who want to have an outdoor movie screening! Just make sure you put the speakers far away from the air flow machine so you don't amplify how loud it already is.
customer_reviews.author: Xylo Tisthe

customer_reviews.title: Buy this thing !
customer_reviews.text: I have an older , but awesome , projector . I got this screen because of the back projection capabilities. I live in the country , so we watch a lot of movies in the woods . I keep the screen , the projector ,dvd player , and all the cords in a large rubbermade tub . Just add the powered speaker and go . Love this screen .
customer_reviews.author: Sam Stucky

customer_reviews.title: Great fun and great deal.
customer_reviews.text: This inflatable screen is so worth the money!!! This is the same one that Disney and major hotels use. It's 14 feet high. We set it up as a practice run for a Halloween party we're having for the Kids and I couldevendo it. To hunge the top part, borrow a 6ft man or use a step stool. This is great for party's, family reunions, sports,etc. I was going to hire a private company and that had tallied up to $500.00+. I now have my screen, projector and speakers for a total of $400.00. Feel confident in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tommye W.

customer_reviews.title: the best one  I am serious
customer_reviews.text: Awesome just need s a deflate blower to reverse the air other wise 5 sta its the best.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked great! Super quick to set up. I love that you can watch the movie from both the front and back of the screen, so we had people sitting in the front watching and people standing at the food tables in the back watching also.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hunsberger

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, high quality, quick to set up.
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace my last blow-up screen that was 10 years old. Thus one is much sturdier, higher quality, and is really fast to set up. Used rear projection and it looked great.
customer_reviews.author: Kaz

customer_reviews.title: the only thing I was disappointed with is the stitching was loose in the frame ...
customer_reviews.text: the only thing I was disappointed with is the stitching was loose in the frame of the screen and the string unraveled for the tethers almost immediately. The screen inflates in under two minutes though. We love that.
customer_reviews.author: Chanda D.

customer_reviews.title: IT WORK GREAT EASY TO SET UP AND TAKE DOWN
customer_reviews.text: IT WORK GREAT EASY TO SET UP AND TAKE DOWN. OTHERS WERE IMPRESSED WITH IT AND SAID WHAT A GREAT IDEA
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best party favor of the summer
customer_reviews.text: We had movie night in the RV park last night and used this screen. Wow, it was so easy to set up and had great picture quality with the projector we were using. It has to be good and dark for it to really work, so late summer nights but, Fall evenings will be big fun. Would highly recommend this screen.
customer_reviews.author: Chip Carr

customer_reviews.title: Great screen!
customer_reviews.text: So I absolutely love this!!! My only complaint is that i didn’t get the blower... thankfully i had one from my bounce house, but it clearly states blower is included. I found something in my packaging that looks like a plug for a heating blanket. So I’m wondering if my order and someone else’s order got mixed. I’m not sure how to email seller.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Best inflatable screen on the market!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!! I use blow up screens all the time, and this is by far.... BY FAR the best deal out there. The quality is amazing!! I hate to correct what the owners said about blow up time being two minutes, but it's more like one minute. The best!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Fuchs

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. Movie night under the stars at Triple ...
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Movie night under the stars at Triple B Ranch was a hit. The best thing about owning it is that we don't have to pay $200 to rent a screen and can have movie night any night.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Movie night perfection
customer_reviews.text: We loved it! Perfect for our first outdoor movie night In our new house.
customer_reviews.author: Da’Stylish Foodie

customer_reviews.title: Great family fun if you have storage space.
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves this outdoor screen. It is quick to set up and take down, and overall easy to use. Cons: It lacks sturdiness in the wind, and needs a lot of room once set up. Also a bit rough to store because of the size when rolled up.
customer_reviews.author: Gina A Vigil

customer_reviews.title: Great product. The old drive in feeling in your back yard.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I was able to get the kids out of the house and have a good family night. Brings back the old drive in without leaving your home. Great for people with small kids that don't want to drag them to a packed movie theatre.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unrealiable
customer_reviews.text: Used it for one party, worked great. The next time we went to use it, it developed a 12” tear.
customer_reviews.author: David Williams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome so far
customer_reviews.text: Awesome so far! Easy to set up and very sturdy! I just used some big sharpy pens to black out the big white logo on the front which was very easy to do. Wished I would have waited and got the bigger one that came out recently from this seller. I'm using the BenQ mh741 in the picture projecting from the rear with minimal gain loss. I would definitely buy from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Willis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: Love this screen, easy to use. Take down was a equally as easy.
customer_reviews.author: michelle connolly

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: We use it when camping or in our neighborhood park for family events. The screen was a little too big for the frame but it still works great and maybe it shrinks with time. Stands up to a fair amount of wind very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its huge.
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. Note you will need about 10ft behind for airblower. Although its huge, just takes up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: adan p.

customer_reviews.title: We love this. Wished the stand was a bit talker
customer_reviews.text: We love this. Wished the stand was a bit talker, but over all its very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jackscraps

customer_reviews.title: Wont regret buying
customer_reviews.text: Makes back yard movies super easy and the screen looks great. Makes family movie night a memorable experience
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, and the screen looked great. Just a pain to store and put away.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged!!!
customer_reviews.text: Huge rip with patch and dirt on it. Seems like it was used and it was not advertised this way. Huge disappointment!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is huge and is exactly what we were ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge and is exactly what we were looking for. We have used it a couple of times now and it preformed perfectly each time. That being said, my blower that came with it was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Great way to watch baseball!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up and take down. Well made and seems very durable. Would def recommend🥰. Picture quality was great! Would def by again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristian Vanderburg

customer_reviews.title: We are so happy we purchased this
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the easiest to assemble and put away. We are so happy we purchased this! We paired it with an Optoma HD143X 1080p 3000 Lumens 3D DLP Home theater projection and have enjoyed many outdoor movies with the whole neighborhood
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: It’s a blast!
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoor movie night. Everyone asked where this came from!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Y.

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about this product
customer_reviews.text: I brought this product in March, and didn't use it until May. It was a small hole in it and they still let me return it. I put a piece of tape over the hole and was able to use it for that day. I love everything about this product. The blower was so quiet I didn't know it was even on. I thought it was super how you can watch from both sizes. My return is in progress, and I got a new one coming today.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good item for the cost
customer_reviews.text: The inflatable part of the screen is great. The actual screen seems pretty good also but I need to wash it a few times to see how it will hold up with the Velcro. So far everything has been great with the setup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A BEAST
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a party that was during a football game.
customer_reviews.author: JoeyNice

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to do movie nights at the community's park by the pool. Easy setup. Everyone loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony R.

customer_reviews.title: Second one a Charm
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Shipping service was bad . Enjoy having it for party’s. Item had small hole , but came with a repair tag . Hard to see. But not a problem with it . Quiet blower .
customer_reviews.author: Alx

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Great buy set up was easy is wall up in less than 1 minute movie night every night now
customer_reviews.author: dallas ross

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Purchase
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this screen. We've had it since January and the kids can't get enough. It's the perfect thing to occupy kids during a party.
customer_reviews.author: eweeks9

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Remarkably easy to set up and works wonderfully. No regret at all.
customer_reviews.author: Katie McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Inflatable movie screen
customer_reviews.text: Needs better tie downs and braces. When the wind blows the whole screens continue to flatter. over all everything is okay. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big mistake
customer_reviews.text: It blew a big hole threw it when we set it up for the first time disappointed
customer_reviews.author: terry

customer_reviews.title: It impresses the neighbors
customer_reviews.text: I would have no issue giving this five stars as it is an awesome product however I got it with a small tear in the screen and the picture looked like it included carrying bag however no bag came with it
customer_reviews.author: Chris d.

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor movie birthday party
customer_reviews.text: The screen worked great for our outdoor movie theme birthday party. Easy to setup and take down. Some users have complained about the white screen thickness being thin. However, this allowed me to setup with rear projection and it looked great.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Gwaltney

customer_reviews.title: Fast and friendly setup
customer_reviews.text: This was a wonderful purchase! Very easy and quick to set up and tear down. It’s the hit of the neighborhood!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Fairchild

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome! Would be 5 stars if it included a ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome! Would be 5 stars if it included a storage bag. Easy setup, takes a bit to deflate and put away. Would be nice if blower could reverse flow for quick deflation. This thing is HUGE so get ready to party.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Grant

customer_reviews.title: Love this screen
customer_reviews.text: This screen is durable and easy to setup. The velcro screen attachment is so convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Jason White

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoor fun and entertainment. I was unsure of ordering for months and finally did it. This screen is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: GIOVANNI

customer_reviews.title: Price and quality were great! Watched the SuperBowl and used the rear projection ...
customer_reviews.text: Price and quality were great! Watched the SuperBowl and used the rear projection so no one casted shadows walking by
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Very stable compared to other products I’ve used in past.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. Used rear projection for nieces 10th birthday. Was the hit of the party.
customer_reviews.author: Maxi Luna

customer_reviews.title: easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: good price, large, and easy to put up and take down
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Kiss

customer_reviews.title: Buy this screen!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This product is phenomenal. The quality of the frame is outstanding, and the size is wonderful. Do yourself a favor a stop looking for an inflatable micro screen because you’ve found one. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: chad palermo

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about this and cannot wait until the weather ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I’m impressed!! Love everything about this and cannot wait until the weather warm so up to put it to use
customer_reviews.author: Mcdougs11

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Product is pretty well made for rear projection position projector at least 15 ft away not sure how durable the seams are will repost should the fail or rip
customer_reviews.author: John Austin

customer_reviews.title: and easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something big, and easy to put up. It blew my mind when it meet all of my expectations. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Martinez7

customer_reviews.title: and it was perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: We used this at our church for several outdoor movie events, and it was perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Phillips

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend a way to securely attach the blower arm to ...
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend a way to securely attach the blower arm to the blower. I plan to use a bundge, put would be nice if this was built in
customer_reviews.author: claudia Hodan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for school movie night
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! Perfect for our school movie nighter. The blower isn't as loud as other blowers. We are completely happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Oh Heck Yea!!
customer_reviews.text: Just revived mine about 10 minutes ago and couldn't wait to blow it up. This thing is impressive. Material feels sturdy and well put together. No I'm going to have to buy a storage bin of sorts to store it all together. Cannot wait to watch our first movie.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome. Screen came with some black marks
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!!! This is awesome. Screen came with some black marks. Waiting to see if it's machine washable.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin McCool

customer_reviews.title: Perfect movie screen
customer_reviews.text: We can’t get enough of our movie screen. The material is thick and made to last long! We purchased it on sale which was a bonus!

product_meta.title: Outdoor Projector Screen
feature_bullets: 🎬 EASY SET UP AND PACK DOWN FOR THE BEST BACKYARD MOVIE EXPERIENCE - we are the first, original, at-home, domestic movie screen family-owned business on Amazon for nearly four years. What is not to love about your very own huge inflatable movie screen in the garden to share with family, friends and neighbours? Think about school events too - how much fun! The Holiday Styling inflatable movie screens are built by hand and tested to give you years of movie and TV entertainment

🎥 MADE WITH STRONG MATERIALS FOR PARTIES CHRISTMAS BIRTHDAY FAMILY TIME - while other inflatable movie screens are loud, don’t inflate properly, have seams down the middle and blow around in the wind, the Holiday Styling Inflatable Movie Screen inflates in seconds, is made with tough 600DD fabric, has a seam-free, theatre quality white viewing area and a very quiet yet powerful blower to ensure the screen stays inflated, which means you can enjoy family fun time without any worries or hassle

😃 FAMILY FUN TIME SET INCLUDES - huge black frame with sturdy, wide base to avoid any movement from wind, white screen viewing area without seams (perfect for Rear and Front projection), powerful electric blower plus pegs and ropes in case of wind but our screens rarely if ever, need these. This all means you can enjoy your movie without a loud sound and have piece of mind that this screen will reward you with years of fun as quality and premium product is our #1 priority

🎉 QUIETEST POWERFUL BLOWER FOR QUICK AND RELIABLE INFLATION - we say it takes two minutes but really it is more like one which means you can enjoy your friends and family oooo’s and ahhhh’s at the size and impact of this screen while you are enjoying the ease of set up. This means more time to set up your projector and speakers ready to tune into the latest movies, TV, Netflix, Amazon or Stan

🍿 OUR COMMITMENT FROM HOLIDAY STYLING - customer satisfaction is our priority and all our products come with quick friendly customer service, a guarantee of quality or your money back ….. order now to start enjoying
